data.name: Echoes of the Stars Demo
data.detailed_description:
Echoes of the Stars is a modern action-JRPG standing on the shoulders of the classics.

■ Key Features




■ Fast paced action combat... We built our battle system to fully take advantage of fast paced action style game play. Dodge and teleport out of harm's way with high mobility skills. Strategize with on the fly character switching that enables you to take a step back with ranged attacks and AoE magic or hone in for close-range melee combat and quick fire abilities.

■ A vast hand-painted world... Lush forests, dank sewers, and the blizzard torn peaks of the Glacia mountains are just a small fraction of the diverse biomes to discover on your journey. As the days come to a close, step inside cozy inns, tea shops, and a variety of stores and houses. You can enter almost all interiors you come across. With our fully built 2D lighting system you will be sure to find the magic in the world.



■ Like a good book... Follow Rin and Eldric as they embark on a journey that bridges time, space, and multiple worlds. Dive deep into the themes of the human condition and the perceived power of gods.Drawing heavily from fantasy and sci-fi elements while exploring a new take on the classic JRPG tropes typically found in the genre. Play the game with a fully voiced cast or play with text only for that classic experience.

■ The melodies of nostalgia... One of the most important aspects of a good JRPG is a solid soundtrack to set the mood and ambience of a game. With over 50 hand crafted tracks, our composer set out to take you on an audible journey through the story and world.

■ Mini games and hidden items... Become a sandwich artist, race to the finish, or seek out the world’s greatest treasures! With mini games and hidden items sprinkled throughout the world, there is always something new to discover.

data.short_description: Echoes of the Stars is a modern action-JRPG standing on the shoulders of the classics. Follow Rin and Eldric in a tale of two souls, bound together by fate in an epic tale of time, space, love, laughter, and the human condition as they challenge those who seek to destroy existence as we know it.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: At least 4 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
